cmp: 门 (opening/door/gate/doorway/gateway/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy))
mng: to sympathize, to pity, to feel compassion for

exm.mng: to sympathize, to pity, to feel compassion for
to take pity on, pity, mercy
to take pity on sb, compassionate
to bemoan the state of the universe and pity the fate of mankind
to take pity on, to feel sorry for
